name: Moist Passover Bagel
author: Eva's Kitchen
summary: Moist Passover bagels that are soft and fluffy. They make matzoh take on a new light. You can still have a sandwich on Passover.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease a baking sheet with cooking spray
Combine water, oil, salt, and sugar in a saucepan and bring to a boil
Add 2 cups matzoh meal; allow to cool for at least 5 minutes
Add eggs, 2 at a time, stirring to incorporate into dough
Form 2 tablespoons of dough into a ball using wet hands
Transfer to the prepared baking sheet
Poke a hole into the middle of each ball
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly brown, 50 minutes to 1 hour
